sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be subtracted from each of the numbers \(10 \), \(16 \), and \(21 \) to make the reminders be in continued proportion.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{Lets suppose that the required number is $z $.

Since the numbers $10 - z $, $16 - z $, $21 - z $, are in proportion, we have}$$
\[
	\frac{10 - z }{16 - z } = \frac{16 - z }{21 - z }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (10 - z )(21 - z ) = (16 - z )(16 - z )
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 210 - z (31 ) + z ^2 = 256 - z (32 ) + z ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z (32 - 31 ) = 256 - 210 
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{256 - 210 }{32 - 31 }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{46 }{1 }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{46 }{1 }
\]"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Suppose the required number that needs to be subtracted from each given number is z. Then, the new set of numbers would be $10 - z $, $16 - z $, $21 - z $,. Since these numbers are in continued proportion, we can write:$\frac{10 - z }{16 - z } = \frac{16 - z }{21 - z }$}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": " Cross-multiplying the above equation, we get: $ (10 - z )(21 - z ) = (16 - z )(16 - z ) $"}, {"data": [], "text": "Expanding the above equation, we get: $ 210 - z (31 ) + z ^2 = 256 - z (32 ) + z ^2$ "}, {"data": [], "text": " Bringing all the common terms on one side, we get: $z (32 - 31 ) = 256 - 210$"}, {"data": [], "text": "Further simplification will get us this equation $z = \frac{256 - 210 }{32 - 31 }$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "Upon further arithmetic calculation, we achieve this: $z = \frac{46 }{1 }$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "Out final result would be $z = \frac{46 }{1 }$ "}]
